author: angela c
title: Excellent Value
text: My girlfriend and I spent Saturday and Sunday here in a Twin room,having paid for the breakfast buffet at the time of booking.We arrived there at about 2pm and our room was ready for us.Check in staff were very pleasant.The beds were as good as Premier Inns claim,the room and bathroom spotless.The bathroom could have done with a few hooks and the 2 soap dispensers contain a very cheap,watery soap but the towels and bedding were very good quality.There was only 1 small towel (and 2 big ones) and the tea making supplies were very mean but reception put both of these issues right. Breakfast was excellent, the hotel is well situated (opposite Weatherspoons and near The Tower !)and on the final day, we were able to leave our luggage locked away in the foyer until were were ready to leave London.Again staff at reception very friendly and helpful.
